name: R5-PractitionerRole-R4B-PractitionerRole
title: Concept map to convert a FHIR R5 PractitionerRole into FHIR R4B

element.display: Roles/organizations the practitioner is associated with

target.display: Roles/organizations the practitioner is associated with
target.comment: R5 `PractitionerRole` maps as Equivalent to R4B `PractitionerRole`

element.display: Whether this practitioner role record is in active use

target.display: Whether this practitioner role record is in active use
target.comment: R5 `PractitionerRole.active` maps as Equivalent to R4B `PractitionerRole.active`

element.display: Times the Practitioner is available at this location and/or healthcare service (including exceptions)
Collection of characteristics (attributes)
Roles which this practitioner may perform

target.display: Roles which this practitioner may perform
target.comment: R5 `PractitionerRole.code` maps as Equivalent to R4B `PractitionerRole.code`

element.display: A language the practitioner (in this role) can use in patient communication
Official contact details relating to this PractitionerRole
Contained, inline Resources

target.comment: R5 `PractitionerRole.contained` maps as Equivalent to R4B `PractitionerRole.contained`

element.display: Endpoints for interacting with the practitioner in this role

target.display: Technical endpoints providing access to services operated for the practitioner with this role
target.comment: R5 `PractitionerRole.endpoint` maps as Equivalent to R4B `PractitionerRole.endpoint`

element.display: Additional content defined by implementations

target.comment: R5 `PractitionerRole.extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4B `PractitionerRole.extension` - extension has change due to type change: R5 `extension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4B `extension`

element.display: Healthcare services provided for this role's Organization/Location(s)

target.display: The list of healthcare services that this worker provides for this role's Organization/Location(s)
target.comment: R5 `PractitionerRole.healthcareService` maps as Equivalent to R4B `PractitionerRole.healthcareService`

element.display: Logical id of this artifact

target.comment: R5 `PractitionerRole.id` maps as Equivalent to R4B `PractitionerRole.id`

element.display: Identifiers for a role/location

target.display: Business Identifiers that are specific to a role/location
target.comment: R5 `PractitionerRole.identifier` maps as Equivalent to R4B `PractitionerRole.identifier`

element.display: A set of rules under which this content was created

target.display: A set of rules under which this content was created
target.comment: R5 `PractitionerRole.implicitRules` maps as Equivalent to R4B `PractitionerRole.implicitRules`

element.display: Language of the resource content

target.comment: R5 `PractitionerRole.language` maps as RelatedTo to R4B `PractitionerRole.language` - language changed the binding strength from Required to Preferred

element.display: Location(s) where the practitioner provides care

target.display: The location(s) at which this practitioner provides care
target.comment: R5 `PractitionerRole.location` maps as Equivalent to R4B `PractitionerRole.location`

element.display: Metadata about the resource

target.comment: R5 `PractitionerRole.meta` maps as Equivalent to R4B `PractitionerRole.meta`

element.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored

target.comment: R5 `PractitionerRole.modifierExtension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4B `PractitionerRole.modifierExtension` - modifierExtension has change due to type change: R5 `modifierExtension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4B `modifierExtension`

element.display: Organization where the roles are available

target.display: Organization where the roles are available
target.comment: R5 `PractitionerRole.organization` maps as Equivalent to R4B `PractitionerRole.organization`

element.display: The period during which the practitioner is authorized to perform in these role(s)

target.display: The period during which the practitioner is authorized to perform in these role(s)
target.comment: R5 `PractitionerRole.period` maps as Equivalent to R4B `PractitionerRole.period`

element.display: Practitioner that provides services for the organization

target.display: Practitioner that is able to provide the defined services for the organization
target.comment: R5 `PractitionerRole.practitioner` maps as Equivalent to R4B `PractitionerRole.practitioner`

element.display: Specific specialty of the practitioner

target.comment: R5 `PractitionerRole.specialty` maps as Equivalent to R4B `PractitionerRole.specialty`

element.display: Text summary of the resource, for human interpretation

target.display: Text summary of the resource, for human interpretation
target.comment: R5 `PractitionerRole.text` maps as Equivalent to R4B `PractitionerRole.text`
